org.apache.beam.sdk.io.cassandra

Class CassandraServiceImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.cassandra.CassandraServiceImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CassandraService<T>

    public class CassandraServiceImpl<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CassandraService<T>
    An implementation of the CassandraService that actually use a Cassandra instance.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      protected static class  CassandraServiceImpl.TokenRange

      Writer storing an entity into Apache Cassandra database.
